pullrequest.title: surface: expand documentation of friction and slip coefficients

content.raw: Based on pyramid model, this `tangential force` is the one aligned with the first friction direction, right? Since the description for `friction` and `friction2` are so similar that I don't want users to take it for granted that this tangential force is sqrt(tangential1^2 + tangential2^2)
content.html: Based on pyramid model, this tangential force is the one aligned with the first friction direction, right? Since the description for friction and friction2 are so similar that I don't want users to take it for granted that this tangential force is sqrt(tangential1^2 + tangential2^2)
